Class ec.ezlib.prim.PendingEvent 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.ezlib.prim.PendingEvent
public class PendingEvent
extends Object
implements Runnable
A PendingEvent is a Runnable that will run() a single delivery event.

NOTE! All the methods of this class trust their callers to 1) only provide interned strings as verb, and 2) not modify an args array after passing it in. Btw, all source code literal strings are automatically intern()ed.

PendingEvent(Object, Resolver, String, Object[])
Reify a pending event

run()
Do now the event that this PendingEvent instance represents.

PendingEvent 
 public PendingEvent(Object rec,
                     Resolver optResolver,
                     String verb,
                     Object args[])
Reify a pending event

run 
 public void run()
Do now the event that this PendingEvent instance represents.
